Text: E̩gba kʼIsrae̩l chʼimo̩to̩, u fe̩do̩ uwñ,
Alu ku ma do̩ ma tule,
Omi la chʼe̩ne̩ ki ko̩ Ifraim ule̩ ele,
Ma ñʼadabi tʼoj ane̩ Ijipti ge̩ n,
O̩fu o̩kwo̩chageli la akwane̩ abʼewo ewo-ma ma,
E̩do̩ abo-mi la chekado elubibi bʼumi te̩;
Ab u nale kʼu natʼuwe̩ no̩? O Ifraim!
Omi la ache teju ukpuna uwe̩do̩-mi n,
ma achi kwo Ijipti wa kpʼo̩la ega dab ame̩we̩,
Ifraim mʼolemi ko donyʼumi daka me̩,
